parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: User-defined ID of a command group

title: ICommandManager.GetCommandIDsCount
description: Gets the number of command IDs for the given command group.

parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: User-defined ID of a command group

returns: Number of command IDs in the given command group
remarks:
Call this method before calling
ICommandManager::IGetGroupDataFromRegistry
to determine the size of the array for that method.
